channel.title: nginx on James Strong
channel.description: Recent content in nginx on James Strong

item.title: Life of a CVE with Ingress-Nginx; Understanding the Project's Release Cycle
item.description: Life of a CVE with Ingress-Nginx; Understanding the Project’s Release Cycle - James Strong, Chainguard & Dylen Turnbull, Nginx INC Speakers: Dylen Turnbull, James Strong In 7 years, Ingress-nginx has had 221 releases, with over 6800 commits. To ensure stability and to test this highly configurable controller, the project has grown to over 400 e2e tests and helm chart tests across various kubernetes versions and deployment landscapes. We were 3/4 through our stabilization project in the last maintainer track we presented.
